title: Capulin Volcano National Monument: Do Business With Us
body: Do Business With Us       Gatherings and commercial activities in national parks often require a special use permit. The purpose of these permits is to ensure the protection of the parkâ€™s natural and cultural resources, as well as to minimize conflicts between park visitors and your guests. Examples of permitted activities include:  Commercial filming and photography   First Amendment events Weddings (and similar gatherings)  Some of the activities may incur a fee.  If you are not sure whether your event requires a permit or you have other questions, contact the park at (575) 278-2201 or email us.
